snippet.title: How to say goodbye | Reveal teaser | ARTE
snippet.description: How to say goodbye is a narrative puzzle game inspired by illustrated books. Move the scenery and manipulate reality to help a group of ghosts wandering between two worlds to reach the "other side". But beware of the evil spirits that will try to keep you prisonner...
